se.dat255.bulletinferno.controller
Class MasterController

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      se.dat255.bulletinferno.controller.MasterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
public class MasterController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game

The master controller is called every frame. It then calls appropriate classes depending on what currently is active in the game. It handles all sub-controllers and screens.
